skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.OrderToFollow
skill.description: To order a set of given units (teammates) to follow agent. The agent acts on each unit by following the order of the units into the 'units' list. A unit won't follow if it cannot perform the mission (the mission is not activated in authoring tool for this type of unit).

parameter.name: followers
parameter.description: The units to order to follow me.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach each unit and ask to follow.

link.name: orderToFollow
link.description: To enact the decision of ordering the given followers to follow.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all temmate units have been visited, even if once of them couldn't follow.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "followers" is empty (no element to act on).

feedback.name: followed
feedback.description: Sent each time the agent is ordering a unit to follow it.

argument.name: follower
argument.description: The unit that has been told to follow.

feedback.name: notFollowed
feedback.description: Sent each time a follower cannot follow the agent.

argument.name: follower
argument.description: The follower that cannot follow the agent.
